metadata.title: CVE-2013-1923 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: rpc-gssd in nfs-utils before 1.2.8 performs reverse DNS resolution for server names during GSSAPI authentication, which might allow remote attackers to read otherwise-restricted files via DNS spoofing attacks.

criterions.comment: nfs-utils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.2.8-6ubuntu4').
